description.content:
Dorsett Kuala Lumpur is located in the heart of Kuala Lumpur's Golden Triangle, a stone's throw away from Malaysia's finest shopping malls, eateries, tourist and entertainment spots. A short 5 minutes' walk will take you to the doorstep of Pavilion, Starhill Gallery, Fahrenheit 88, Lot 10, Sungai Wang, Berjaya Times Square and Low Yat Plaza. The KL Convention Centre and Petronas Twin Towers are also within walking distance from the hotel through an air-conditioned link bridge. 
Dorsett Kuala Lumpur's newly renovated rooms & suites, offering refreshed & stylish accommodations. These rooms were designed with you in mind, pairing chic design with state-of-the-art amenities for optimal comfort and an unparalleled guest experience. 
The charm of our new rooms & suites is found in their enriched furnishings and enhanced amenities. All of them provide a combination of feather and polyester pillows, Full HD LED TV sets, High-speed Internet Access, built-in wardrobes and Dorsett's unique range of toiletries. 
Dorsett Kuala Lumpur's ideal location ensures that many of our well-appointed rooms offer mesmerizing views of the city: with old colonial-style shops existing alongside its skyscrapers, including the iconic Petronas Twin Towers. 
Whether you are traveling on business or leisure, stay connected with our Wi-fi Internet access and docking stations. 

For those seeking the extra comfort of home on extended stays in the city of Kuala Lumpur, check out Dorsett Residences @ Dorsett Kuala Lumpur: with 52 impeccably appointed suites and 2-bedroom residences of high-quality fixtures and fittings, Dorsett Residences @Dorsett Kuala Lumpur is designed to perfection. Each unit comes with high gloss kitchen complete with full kitchen and washer dryer combo for the convenience of extended stays. 

The infinity pool and Fitness Studio offers unrivaled views of the city's skyline and iconic skyscrapers of the Twin Towers and KL Tower.

We look forward to seeing you soon.

Seri Pacific Hotel Kuala Lumpur is a 5 star business hotel in Kuala Lumpur. Featuring 560 rooms including suites and Club rooms, Seri Pacific Hotel Kuala Lumpur is an exceptional hotel with a level of hospitality that goes beyond your normal range of luxurious hotel. All rooms are fitted with modern amenities that will make your accommodation in Kuala Lumpur a comfortable one.
